Name: Stela of Bes
Description: Bes is the dwarf god of joy. He was also considered to be a demon. Bes is depicted on this stela with his typical grotesque mask-like facial features. Bes is holding two lions. Two antelopes stand next to his legs. Because of his great strength, it was believed Bes was able to strangle lions, antelopes, and snakes with his bare hands. Bes was a household deity and stelae like this artifact were placed in houses for protection.
